$interpreted: Nervous Recruit: Hey, look over there...
Vigilant Recruit: Shhh, he's looking at us...
Devious: Snake Father, Snake Mother, the children of the desert are leaving for war. Watch over them and lead them to victory in thy name.
Devious: You are...human.
Devious: Ah, yes. I have heard of you. You are the human slave who survived the Martyrs' Colosseum.
Lazer: ......
Devious: I heard that you had already escaped and yet...you returned willingly to the Colosseum.
Lazer: ...I'm all alone, in a foreign land. I was bound to be captured sooner or later.
Lazer: The only choice I had at life was to survive the Colosseum.
Lazer: Do I sense that the High Priest also feels this world...is nothing more than chaos? That life itself is a disgrace?
Devious: No, it's just...those gathered here in the Shrine are young ones hoping to enlist in the war against the Kingdom of the Sun...
Devious: There's no way you are here for the same reason?
Lizard General: Ridiculous! Do not listen to his blabberings, High Priest!
Lizard General: This pitiful human. He doesn't even have horns and he wants to join us!? He's got "spy" written all over his ugly forehead!
Lizard General: You'll enter our ranks when you step over my dead body.
Lazer: Are you saying if I kill you, I can join?
Lizard General: WAHAHA!! I still remember your shrill voice, human. Give it a try, if you so desire!
Devious: Justice...is nothing but the interest of the stronger.
Devious: I swear upon my position as High Priest, that I shall faithfully witness and uphold the will of the Snake God.
Lazer: ...Let's do this.
Lizard General: Please...help...
Lizard General: Help! Kill this human! High Priest! We're both lizards!!!
Devious: .........
Lizard General: ...Hehe...how pathetic. I never thought I'd die at the hands of a human...
Lazer: Don't worry. I'll forget you...and your shrill voice.
Devious: This mask was given as an offering to the Snake Gods by the nobles. Since this is the will of God, I believe you are worthy of wearing it.
Devious: ...I have one more question.
Lazer: ...And what's that?
Devious: Is it worth it to give up all of this...just to live?
Lazer: ...The Desert Kingdom has something that the Kingdom of the Sun does not.
Devious: Is that so?
Lazer: ——Mirage.
Lazer: I've found...my Mirage.
Lazer: I don't know if it's worth it...but I must see that child.
Lazer: Please pray for me, High Priest.
Devious: ...Your valor is strong enough to endure the pain.
Diana: You may look like me, but your hand is disgusting! How do you expect to protect me!?
Secret Service: Forgive me...
Diana: I'll find a martial arts instructor for you. If you can't improve...I'll have to punish you.
Secret Service: ......
Secret Service: No. It's not the time for crying. I must continue to work harder.
Secret Service: ......
Lazer: ...Every time I see you, you are crying.
Lazer: Your hand...does it still hurt?
Secret Service: How did you know that? Who are you?
Lazer: I am your martial arts instructor.
Secret Service: (Strange...I've never met this man before. Yet, it feels like I've known him forever...)
Secret Service: Excuse me, have we met before?

Model.Text: Hey, look over there...
Shhh, he's looking at us...
Snake Father, Snake Mother, the children of the desert are leaving for war. Watch over them and lead them to victory in thy name.
You are...human.
Ah, yes. I have heard of you. You are the human slave who survived the Martyrs' Colosseum.
I heard that you had already escaped and yet...you returned willingly to the Colosseum.
...I'm all alone, in a foreign land. I was bound to be captured sooner or later.
The only choice I had at life was to survive the Colosseum.
Do I sense that the High Priest also feels this world...is nothing more than chaos? That life itself is a disgrace?
No, it's just...those gathered here in the Shrine are young ones hoping to enlist in the war against the Kingdom of the Sun...
There's no way you are here for the same reason?
Ridiculous! Do not listen to his blabberings, High Priest!
This pitiful human. He doesn't even have horns and he wants to join us!? He's got "spy" written all over his ugly forehead!
You'll enter our ranks when you step over my dead body.
Are you saying if I kill you, I can join?
WAHAHA!! I still remember your shrill voice, human. Give it a try, if you so desire!
Justice...is nothing but the interest of the stronger.
I swear upon my position as High Priest, that I shall faithfully witness and uphold the will of the Snake God.
...Let's do this.
Please...help...
Help! Kill this human! High Priest! We're both lizards!!!
...Hehe...how pathetic. I never thought I'd die at the hands of a human...
Don't worry. I'll forget you...and your shrill voice.
This mask was given as an offering to the Snake Gods by the nobles. Since this is the will of God, I believe you are worthy of wearing it.
...I have one more question.
...And what's that?
Is it worth it to give up all of this...just to live?
...The Desert Kingdom has something that the Kingdom of the Sun does not.
Is that so?
——Mirage.
I've found...my Mirage.
I don't know if it's worth it...but I must see that child.
Please pray for me, High Priest.
...Your valor is strong enough to endure the pain.
You may look like me, but your hand is disgusting! How do you expect to protect me!?
Forgive me...
I'll find a martial arts instructor for you. If you can't improve...I'll have to punish you.
No. It's not the time for crying. I must continue to work harder.
...Every time I see you, you are crying.
Your hand...does it still hurt?
How did you know that? Who are you?
I am your martial arts instructor.
(Strange...I've never met this man before. Yet, it feels like I've known him forever...)
Excuse me, have we met before?
